page.title: 11Preface
page.content: This block is essentially rural with agricultural land both arable and pasture for beef cattle. There is a certain amount of common land at Weston Common; woodland at Little Park and Humbly Grove and some Forestry Commission plantations. A recent development is the discovery of oil with a well at Humbly Grove and one at Weston Common with a Collection and Distribution Centre. The total population is very small and apart from various farms, consists of the village of Weston Patrick,part of Weston Corbett and a small housing estate at Powntley Copse. There are no shops or public houses but Weston Patrick does have a church and a village hall. There are no clubs but some ladies are members of Upton Grey Womens Institute who prepared this survey.
